channel.title: .cfg's not found... [Solved]
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape! I've recently thought of creating a new server. I downloaded Kevenscape, I compiled and everything. Now when I turn on "Run.bat" it says: [code] npc.cfg: file not found. npcdrops.cfg: file not found. autospawn.cfg: file not found. item.cfg: file not found. globaldrops.cfg: file not found. doors.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. KevenScape Server. [/code]
It isn't reading the cfg files... They're in the folder... Is ther a directory im supposed to make for these files? Right now im looking through files looking for a specific 'directory' for these .cfg files... Help plz?

item.title: .cfg's not found... [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @killax killax
item.description:
@killax wrote:

oh alright thanks for the info hehe, no wonder i couldn’t find it o=

Read full topic

item.title: .cfg's not found... [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

killax:

right… how do i give rep again? Lol i can’t seem to find it on moparscape…

Don’t give out rep to simple things like this, especially to people who ask for it. You can click the [Rep++] button under their name. Unless it was changed with the SMF 2.0 upgrade, you need 15 reputation to rep others.

Read full topic

KevenScape Server.

It isn’t reading the cfg files… They’re in the folder… Is ther a directory im supposed to make for these files? Right now im looking through files looking for a specific ‘directory’ for these .cfg files…
Help plz?[/quote]

are these files in a folder called “config”?
